headline: Gryphon Investors Completes $1.6 Billion Sale of Shermco to Blackstone
summary: Gryphon Investors ("Gryphon"), a leading middle-market private investment firm, announced today that it has completed the sale of its portfolio company Shermco ("the Company"), a leader in electrical testing, engineering, maintenance and repair, to private equity funds affiliated with Blackstone (NYSE: BX). The transaction, valued at approximately $1.6 billion, was previously announced on August 21, 2025.

headline: GPZ: A Compelling Way To Play The Private Markets Boom
summary: The VanEck Alternative Asset Manager ETF offers exposure to top firms benefiting from private market growth and strong earnings. Learn why GPZ ETF is a buy.
